text: Shin-Ōsaka Station (新大阪駅,しんおおさかえき) is a railway station of JR West, JR Central and Osaka Municipal Subway in Yodogawa-ku, Osaka, Japan. == Adjacent stations == ;JR West : Sanyō Shinkansen :::Kyoto (Tōkaidō Shinkansen) - Shin-Ōsaka - Shin-Kobe :Tōkaidō Line (JR Kyoto Line) :: Special Rapid Service ::: Takatsuki - Shin-Ōsaka - Ōsaka :: Rapid Service ::: Ibaraki - Shin-Ōsaka - Ōsaka :: Local ::: Higashi-Yodogawa - Shin-Ōsaka - Ōsaka : Through trains to and from the Hanwa Line :: Rapid Service, B Rapid Service ::: Shin-Ōsaka - Nishikujo ;JR Central : Tōkaidō Shinkansen :::Kyoto - Shin-Ōsaka - Shin-Kobe (Sanyō Shinkansen) ;Osaka Municipal Subway : Midōsuji Line :::Higashi-Mikuni (M12) - Shin-Ōsaka (M13) - Nishinakajima-Minamigata (M14) ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture
title: Shin-Ōsaka Station
